#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    return(gcd(b,a%b));
}
int main()
{
    int n,i;
    long long lcm,hcf,temp;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    vector<int> v1(n),v2(n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&(v1[i]));
        scanf("%d",&(v2[i]));
    }
    hcf=v1[0];
    lcm=v2[0];
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        hcf=gcd(hcf,v1[i]);
        temp=gcd(lcm,v2[i]);
        lcm=(lcm*v2[i])/temp;
    }
    printf("%lld/%lld",hcf,lcm);
    return 0;
}
